title: Graphical Inverse Derivatives
description: Interactive visualization showing the relationship between a function and its inverse, with tangent lines demonstrating that the derivative of an inverse function equals the reciprocal of the original function's derivative.
creator: Dan McCreary
subject: Calculus
Derivatives
Inverse Functions
Tangent Lines
Reciprocal Slopes
prerequisites: Familiarity with function families (exponential, logarithmic, power)
learningObjective: Students will understand that the derivative of an inverse function equals the reciprocal of the original function's derivative
